ngoList.title: Tarun Pragati Club
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The Organization came into existence on 11-07-1969 during the holy Birth Centenary year of Father of the Nation,Mahatma Gandhi and since then is working in the field of Art & Culture; Sports & Games; Library & Reading room; Welfare activities for Youth, Children, Women & the Aged and other socio-welfare activities as furnished below. 1)LIBRARY & READING ROOM ACTIVITIES: The Organization has a well-equipped Library having more than 3000 books and a no of newspapers & magazines and is functioning in a 440 sq.ft. hall of its own. Reading facilities are open to all. 2)SPORTS & GAMES ACITIVITIES: Various indoor and outdoor games are played daily in the club and Annual Sports Competition is held every year in which Block/District level competitors participate. 3)ART & CULTURAL ACTIVITIES: Ganesh Puja, Saraswati Puja, Independence Day, Republic Day etc are celebrated with ceremony and cultural programs are arranged on festive occasions. Odia dramma is staged every year by the members in association with local artists. Besides Drawing & Painting and Song competitions are conducted among school students on account of National Days and Special Occasions. 4)ACTIVITIES FOR CHILDREN: Balwadi with Nutrition Program from the year 1977-78 to 1986-87 and Early Childhood Education Program from 1983-84 to 2000-01 for 25 children of age group 06 years in each were effectively conducted. Rajiv Gandhi National Creche scheme for the children of said age group is now being implemented since 1987-88.Holiday Home camps for children of age group 9-16 were successfully conducted in the year 1975,1977,1979 and 1981 at Bhubaneswar, Puri and GopalpuronSea for a period of 15 days each. 5)ACTIVITIES FOR WOMEN & ADULTS: One year vocational training in tailoring & cutting for 25 rural adult women in 1982-83, one Readymade Garments unit for rural women in 1985-87,one Orientation Training Program for rural women in 1985 and Awareness Generation Program for rural women in 2013 were effectively conducted. Besides, one Adults Literacy Program was launched for adult/aged people for one year in 1978-79. 6)YOUTH ACITIVITIES: Most of the activities of the institution are cared by the young members. They are facilitated to attend various youth camps conducted by Nehru Yuva Kendra, Ministry of HRD and Central/State Social Welfare Board. Excursion Trips are arranged to visit places of importance inside and outside the state. 7)SOCIO-WELFARE & ECONOMIC ACTIVITIES: The Organization undertakes Pisciculture and agricultural activities to raise funds for the institution. The members have constructed two buildings for the organization bending their energy. They take initiative to aware the women of their legal rights and motivate them to form SHG groups. Besides Health & Sanitation activities and other welfare works are also taken up by the organization.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Thakkar Bapa Seva Sadan is an Orphanage Ashram established on 1st April 1984 with the strong determination and hard work of Great Social Worker Ms. Arati Biswas and other like minded person. The organization is working mainly for the upliftment of the children in need of Care and Protection. Following are the major achievements of the organization. More then 50 children between the age group of 0-5 years has been nourished by the organization. About 100 numbers of children were rahibilited to their parents and family. 20 numbers of inmates got employment. About 15 girls got married from the organization. About 30 care of child marriage has been stooped by the organisation. Different government and non-government officials including Governor of Odisha Sri M M Rajendran have been visited to the institution. Many girl and boys has been enrolled for higher education and scholarship.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: TOWARD is a reputed state-level Research oriented developmental organization, working towards sustainable development process through participatory efforts of development activities, training and research since 1994. It is having a strong Networking system all over the State and well equipped infrastructure facilities with a sufficient number of multi disciplinary faculties. It is a multi-disciplinary body, which focuses on the problems of poor, weaker, distressed and deprived sections of the society in the development, protection and conservation of natural resources, promotion of sustainable livelihood and protection of human rights at all levels. The Thrust areas of- TOWARD are as Follows :-  Research/ Evaluation/Impact Assessment Studies/ Seminars/ Workshops/ Baseline Survey etc.  Organizing Entrepreneurship Skill up gradation Training specially for poor and unemployed youth(women) for augmentation of their socio-economic status  Working for SHG-Promotion and Organizing Entrepreneurship Development Programme (EDP) for creating employment opportunities for rural poor women, SC/ST and EWS people as well as for the poor artisans for revival of languishing crafts .  Marketing of Rural based products such as : Handicrafts / Handloom items and other Village Industries Products etc. by way of making arrangement with like minded agencies and also by participating in the exhibition and festivals.  We also undertake various awareness, educational and documentation activities for creating confidence and self status among the rural poor and neglected groups of women like : SC/ST/ Minority etc.  Undertaking various art & cultural programmes among the school and college students for preservation of traditional culture of our state and promotion of national integration and restoration of unity among the diversity & many more Need Based Action oriented Socio-economic and Development Research Studies are being conducted in the field of :-  Human Resource Development  Natural Resource Development  Social Survey and Studies  Feasibility Studies Processing of Data and documentation  Rural Development,  Women empowerment  Rehabilitation and Reconstruction,  Skill upgradation development,  Welfare activities for all round development of Scheduled Tribe, Scheduled Caste, OBC & Minorities  Educational Development,  Animal Welfare Activities,  Environmental Protection,  Eradication of untouchability, TOWARD has got enormous experience in the field of Research, Evaluation, Monitoring, Seminar, Workshop, Skill Up Gradation Training, Entrepreneurship Development Programme(EDP) ,Designing Development Training Of Languishing Tribal Art & Craft, Income Generation Programme For SHG Beneficiaries, Project Formulation & Documentation Works etc . Our Organization has been funded by several Ministries / Departments of both GoI & Govt. of Odisha like:  Ministry of Tribal Affairs  Ministry of Women & Child Development  Ministry of HRD  Ministry of Agriculture  Ministry of Culture & Tourism  Ministry of Food Processing Industries  Dept. of SC/ST, Govt. of Orissa  Directorate of Industries, Govt. of Orissa  State Mission Directorate, NMFP  Many other funding agencies. ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Kartavya volunteers have taught in various schools of Nayagarh district through our ISR for school students of HIgh school level. We have tought basic computer hardware and networking courses in the schools. We have volunteered to provide help to the flood affected areas of Odisha in different years making available food items and other utility for the affected people. We have encouraged poor students for study by giving them scholarship to study higher education in the level of Masters degree

sourceOfFunds.purpose: The college was applied for various funded research schemes of Govt of India. It has applied to Deptt of Science and technology, Govt of India, AICTE, New Delhi and also to various other departments from our MBA and MCA departments. Also the trust runs a Biotechnology college under the same name as trust. For that we have approached to Deptt of BIotechnology Govt of India regading funded research scheme but no program has been approved for that year. However we have spend money from our own.for

Students of Trident Academy of Creative Technology has formed a Club in the name of Kartavya. Under that banner they have moved various schools which were unreachable by different agencies for promotion of IT and ICT. We have showcased the matter to CISCO Inc, USA through its CSR wing SIlicon Valley Community organization, they have sanctioned us $20000 for that purpose. We have trained around 4223 schools students across 26 schools in Dhenkanal and Jagatsinghpur district of Odisha. Also we have

Department of Business Administration of our college we have applied for various schemes under AICTE Quality Improvement Scheme. For that year we were allowed to have one Faculty development program for our college. The week-long workshop has faculties from other colleges where we were guided by industry experts on XPSS system using MS Excel. This workshop allowed the faculty members to learn certain new ideas and methods which have added creativity in them which in return shall help our student

One of our Professor in School of Biotech Sciences of our College has applied to Department of Biotechnology, Govt of India for a collaborative project between CIFA and TACT. The name of the project is Development of a RNA Interference based silencing approach targeting Lectins gene transcripts in fresh water Prawn Macrobrachium rosenbergii and its implications as a biotherapeutant. We been sanction Rs 3232200.00 to complete this project. The high value project with CIFA shall help us in find

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Womens community management group is a state level womens voluntary organization. It is registered under the Societies Registration Act XXX-1860 with IGR Cuttack. Presently the organization is woring for the poor needy women, schedule cast / schedule tribe, child and physically and mentally retared people. The Organization is situated in Sankarpur mouza of Bolagarh Block inside the Khurda District of Orissa which is 72 Kms from the State Capital Bhubaneswar. It has own Building Office artcles. Now it has 250 numbers of women of its member. Now the organization is taking the responsbility of 133 nos. Leporsy Cured Persons for their Vocational training and fooding and the health checkup in a permanent basis. In every year the organization is giving Computer training to 60 nos. women, 300 nos. of women are taking training of Bamboo product and bamboo house-hold articles and the regular items and 500 Nos. of women are taking training on food processing. In addition every year we are also giving short term training on the tailoring, embroidery and printing to 200 nos. of women. We also support for the placement of the trainees and provide the production centre for them.

The project envisages enhancing the livelihood of rural poor in Boipariguda block of Koraput district. It aims at suitable interventions for both marginal farmers and landless families. It is proposed to have land and water management and its efficient use to not only improve the productivity of crops to ensure round the year food sufficiency but also generate marketable surplus. The plan is also to have enterprise based livelihood for the landless families to make the project more comprehensive

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: In the absence of appropriate support the much expcted non-farm sector has taken a back seat. Infrastructure available in rural remained unutilized. Therefore Jugatar Yuba Sangathan has planned for enterprise development that would break the confident within agriculture related enterprise and lead to non-confirmation of gender-based enterprise development. It has taken different activities like building SHGs linkages, Agro-processing, promotion of rural artisanas and organic farming as Income Generation activities. To alarge extent, there has been success in breaking the gender-based stereotype up income generation programme that had primarily been ion the domain of the area.
